trans-unit.resname: OPC2·1 | Chaotic Aether | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, each blank roll of the planar die is a {CHAOS} roll until a player planeswalks away from a plane. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: 当你遭遇乙太混沦时，时空骰掷出的空白结果均为{CHAOS}结果，直到有牌手时空换出任一时空为止。（然后时空换出此异象。）

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；竞逐时空2 WAR：跨时空信标 Interplanar Beacon
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·4 | Mutual Epiphany | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, each player draws four cards. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: 当你遭遇交汇启悟时，每位牌手各抓四张牌。（然后时空换出此异象。）

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·5 | Planewide Disaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, destroy all creatures. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: 当你遭遇时空灾难时，消灭所有生物。（然后时空换出此异象。）

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·6 | Reality Shaping | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, starting with you, each player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. (Then planeswalk away from this phenomenon.)
trans-unit.target: 当你遭遇凭空塑形时，由你开始，每位牌手各可以将一张永久物牌从其手上放进战场。（然后时空换出此异象。）

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·7 | Spatial Merging | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you encounter CARDNAME, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal two plane cards. Simultaneously planeswalk to both of them. Put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当你遭遇境界交融时，从你时空套牌顶开始展示牌，直到展示出两张时空牌为止。同时时空换入两者。将所有以此法展示的其他牌依任意顺序置于你的时空套牌底。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·12 | Bloodhill Bastion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, it gains double strike and haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物进战场时，它获得连击与敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·12 | Bloodhill Bastion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, exile target nontoken creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，放逐目标由你操控且非衍生物的生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·13 | Edge of Malacol | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译；MUL：隐匿者洼巴司（背景叙述）

trans-unit.target: 所有生物具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·18 | Grove of the Dreampods | Card Name
OPC2·18 | Grove of the Dreampods | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME and at the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入眠梦荚树丛和在你的维持开始时，从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。将该牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·18 | Grove of the Dreampods | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·19 | Hedron Fields of Agadeem | Card Name
OPC2·19 | Hedron Fields of Agadeem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures with power 7 or greater can't attack or block.
trans-unit.target: 力量等于或大于7的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·19 | Hedron Fields of Agadeem | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, create a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature token with annihilator 1. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，派出一个7/7无色，具歼灭1的奥札奇衍生生物。（每当它攻击时，防御牌手牺牲一个永久物。）

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a creature spell that's black, red, or green, it gains devour 5. (As the creature enters the battlefield, its controller may sacrifice any number of creatures. The creature enters the battlefield with five times that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放黑色，红色或绿色的生物咒语时，它获得吞噬5。（于该生物进战场时，其操控者可以牺牲任意数量的生物。此生物进战场时上面有该数量五倍的+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，派出两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·22 | Kharasha Foothills | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control attacks a player, for each other opponent, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature, tapped and attacking that opponent. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物攻击任一牌手时，对每位其他对手而言，你可以派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，其为横置且正向该对手进行攻击。在下一个结束步骤开始时放逐这些衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·22 | Kharasha Foothills | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. If you do, CARDNAME deals that much damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，你可以牺牲任意数量的生物。若你如此作，则卡拉沙丘陵对目标生物造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·24 | Lair of the Ashen Idol | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；MOM：火山之怨 Volcanic Spite
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；半官译：https://magic.wizards.com/zh-Hant/news/magic-story/promises-keep-2015-12-02
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译

非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；半官译

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·29 | Orochi Colony | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·29 | Orochi Colony | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·33 | Selesnya Loft Gardens | Card Name
OPC2·33 | Selesnya Loft Gardens | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an effect would create one or more tokens, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某效应将派出一个或数个衍生物，则改为它派出两倍数量的该类衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·33 | Selesnya Loft Gardens | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某效应将在任一永久物上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为在该永久物上放置两倍数量的该类指示物。

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·33 | Selesnya Loft Gardens | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, until end of turn, whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌，直到回合结束，每当你横置一个地以产生法术力时，加一点该地已产生的类别之法术力。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals damage to one or more players for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物每回合首度对一位或多位牌手造成伤害时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, each creature you control gains "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker" until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，每个由你操控的生物均获得「{T}：此生物对目标牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害」直到回合结束。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译
非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；貌似官译是这么样的

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·37 | Trail of the Mage-Rings | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·38 | Truga Jungle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All lands have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
trans-unit.target: 所有地具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。」

trans-unit.resname: OPC2·38 | Truga Jungle | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，展示你牌库顶的三张牌。将以此法展示的所有地牌置于你手上，其余则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PC2·19 | Illusory Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: 只能于你已施放过其他咒语的回合中施放虚幻天使。

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 当虫背酋长进战场时，将两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PC2·60 | Brindle Shoat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 3/3 green Boar creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当斑幼猪死去时，派出一个3/3绿色野猪衍生生物。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；官译

trans-unit.resname: PC2·82 | Baleful Strix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PC2·82 | Baleful Strix | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当恶邪枭进战场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PC2·87 | Dragonlair Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PC2·87 | Dragonlair Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，将一个1/1绿色昆虫衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PC2·91 | Etherium-Horn Sorcerer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}{R}: Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}{R}：将乙金角术士移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: PC2·91 | Etherium-Horn Sorcerer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到你放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PC2·99 | Krond the Dawn-Clad | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: PC2·101 | Maelstrom Wanderer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: PC2·101 | Maelstrom Wanderer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Cascade, cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. Then do it again.)
trans-unit.target: 倾曳，倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。然后再作一次。）

trans-unit.resname: PC2·104 | Shardless Agent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: PC2·105 | Silent-Blade Oni | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ninjutsu {4}{U}{B} ({4}{U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 忍术{4}{U}{B}（{4}{U}{B}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物回手：将此牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: PC2·105 | Silent-Blade Oni | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand. You may cast a spell from among those cards without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当静刃邪鬼对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，检视该牌手的手牌。你可以从这些牌之中施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

PC2·111 | Fractured Powerstone | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Roll the planar die. Activate only as a sorcery.

trans-unit.resname: PC2·113 | Sai of the Shinobi | Card Name
PC2·113 | Sai of the Shinobi | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PC2·113 | Sai of the Shinobi | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach CARDNAME to it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以将忍者钗装备于其上。

trans-unit.resname: PC2·113 | Sai of the Shinobi | Card Text | Paragraph 3
